0: Cons, what makes you think you are any better than the rest?
1: If your homies wouldn't flip on you for a check
2: They try to stick you up for that chain around your neck
3: Even if they did man there is no disrespect
4: It's the rules of engagement, you just got engaged
5: Tryin to rewrite history before they turn the page
6: But that’s when they turn and aim
7: Shit you better learn the game
8: I mean what you thought would happen once you finally got ya stacks up
9: The same boy who would tell them fools to back up
10: Is mad as hell when he sees you hold your plaques up
11: To get them dranks in him (now he wanna act up)
12: To tell the friend who tell the friend to tell the friend
13: And since there's strength in numbers, jealousy begins
14: And it doesn’t matter if it’s true or it's not
15: These are the Consequences when they say that you’re hot
17: They see me in that Benz coupe now they wanna jack 'em
18: But before they would have backed em
19: Now they screamin let me at em
20: Maybe they seen me on the videos
21: Or they heard me on the radio
22: And now they coming at me crazy yo
23: That’s why I gotta tuck the 80 yo
24: But how you gonna front on baby bro
25: Who's trying to go even though you told him take it slow
27: That they would put a suit on me like g's to gents
28: But I'm like a tea-bag when you put me in the corner
29: I just get stronger when my name's in hot water
30: So whether is true or not
31: These are the consequences when they say that you're hot
title: Everybody Told Me
